meanings.definition: A person or thing that affixes something
meanings.sent1: The affixers attached the sign to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The affixers in the office are responsible for putting up posters.
meanings.sent3: The affixers had a race to see who could stick the label on the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was like an affixers, connecting people together with her warm personality.
meanings.sent5: The affixers carefully glued each piece together, creating a beautiful collage.
